feed.title: CUS Elections Guide
feed.subtitle: A guide for the MCC CUS Elections 2020-2021.

entry.title: Android
entry.content:
Step 1a

Login to your @mcc.edu.in account on your phone

How do I do that?
  • Open any Google App
  • Tap on your profile picture to open the account switcher
  • Tap on Add Account
  • Login to your @mcc.edu.in account
I don't know my password!
  • Never reset it before? Ask your class rep for the default password
  • Reset it but forgot? Use the Forgot password option

Step 1b

Login to your @mcc.edu.in account in your browser

Chrome?
  • Open google.com on Chrome
  • Tap on your profile picture on the top right
  • No @mcc.edu.in ID? Tap on Add accounts and add it
Something else?
  • Open google.com on your browser
  • Tap on your profile picture on the top right
  • If your @mcc.edu.in ID isn't there, tap on Add accounts and add it

Step 2

Join the Google Meet hosted by your class‚Äô polling officer
If your computer doesn‚Äôt have a camera, please switch to a device that has a camera

I am not being admitted!
  • Click on Switch account on bottom and choose the @mcc.edu.in account and try again
Some error?
  • It keeps closing?
  • The poll attendance has not yet started
  • Please wait a while and join again
Who's my polling officer?
  • Ask your class rep

Step 3

When your professor calls your name for attendance:

  • Turn on camera and mic
  • Show your face and say present
  • Ensure that your professor has seen and heard you
  • You may turn camera and mic off
My phone doesn't have a front camera!
  • Please use a device with a camera. This is important to ensure votes are not misused.
  • Or if you can, ask someone to hold the phone and use the backcamera

Step 4

Wait till the appointed time for polling

I am boredddd!
  • If this were in real-life you'd be standing the entire time. üòë
  • This way you at least get to sit! üéâ

Step 5

Your professor will share the link to the Ballot Form

I did not get the link!
  • Ask your professor where they have shared the link

Step 6

Open the link to the Ballot form
For now, try this similarly set up form at forms.gle/s333jfaMsHcAAkS86

I need permission?
  • Check if you are logged in on your browser. Refer Step 1b
  • Used something other than Chrome in Step 1b?
  • Copy and paste the link into your browser
It didn't load at all
  • Check your internet

Step 7

Vote for your preferred candidate and submit the form
Remember, no take-backs. You can submit only once

Step 8

Go back to the Meet
Open the chat Send a message saying ‚ÄúYES‚Äù

I got disconnected You can:
  • Try joining again
  • Ask a friend to send a message with your name saying "YES"

Step 9

Leave the Meet

Step 10

Await the results

Live. Love. MCC! ‚ù§Ô∏è

entry.title: Computer
entry.content:
Step 1

Login to your @mcc.edu.in account in your browser

I don't know my password!
  • Never reset it before? Ask your class rep for the default password
  • Reset it but forgot? Use the Forgot password option

Step 2

Join the Google Meet hosted by your class‚Äô polling officer
If your computer doesn‚Äôt have a camera, please switch to a device that has a camera

I am not being admitted!
  • Click on Switch account on the bottom and choose the @mcc.edu.in account and try again
Some error?
  • It says you cannot start the meeting or that you are not an administrator?
  • The poll attendance has not yet started
  • Please wait a while and join again
Who's my polling officer?
  • Ask your class rep

Step 3

When your professor calls your name for attendance:

  • Turn on camera and mic
  • Show your face and say present
  • Ensure that your professor has seen and heard you
  • You may turn camera and mic off
My computer doesn't have a camera!
  • Please use a device with a camera
  • Not showing your face for video verification will result in removal from Meet
  • This is to prevent misuse of votes

Step 4

Wait till the appointed time for polling

I am boredddd!
  • If this were in real-life you'd be standing the entire time. üòë
  • This way you at least get to sit! üéâ

Step 5

Your professor will share the link to the Ballot Form

I did not get the link!
  • Ask your professor where they have shared the link

Step 6

Open the link to the Ballot form
For now, try this similarly set up form at forms.gle/s333jfaMsHcAAkS86

I need permission?
  • Check if you are logged in on your browser. Refer Step 1
It didn't load at all
  • Check your internet

Step 7

Vote for your preferred candidate and submit the form
Remember, no take-backs. You can submit only once

Step 8

  • Go back to the Meet
  • Open the chat
  • Send a message saying ‚ÄúYES‚Äù
I got disconnected You can:
  • Try joining again
  • Ask a friend to send a message with your name saying "YES"

Step 9

Leave the Meet

Step 10

Await the results

Live. Love. MCC! ‚ù§Ô∏è

entry.title: iOS
entry.content:
Step 1a

Login to your @mcc.edu.in account on any Google App

How do I do that?
  • Open any Google App
  • Tap on your profile picture to open the account switcher
  • Tap on Add Accounts
  • Login using your @mcc.edu.in account
I don't know my password!
  • Never reset it before? Ask your class rep for the default password
  • Reset it but forgot? Use the Forgot password option

Step 1b

Login to your @mcc.edu.in account in your browser

Safari?
  • Go to google.com on Safari
  • Tap on your profile picture on the top right
  • No @mcc.edu.in ID? Tap on Add account and add it
Chrome?
  • Open google.com on Chrome
  • Tap on your profile picture on the top right
  • If your @mcc.edu.in ID isn't there, tap on Add accounts and add it
Something else?
  • Open google.com on your browser
  • Tap on your profile picture on the top right
  • If your @mcc.edu.in ID isn't there, tap on Add accounts and add it

Step 2

Join the Google Meet hosted by your class‚Äô polling officer
If your device doesn‚Äôt have a good camera, please switch to another device

I am not being admitted!
  • Click on Switch account on bottom and choose the @mcc.edu.in account and try again
Some error?
  • It keeps closing?
  • The poll attendance has not yet started
  • Please wait a while and join again
Who's my polling officer?
  • Ask your class rep

Step 3

When your professor calls your name for attendance:

  • Turn on camera and mic
  • Show your face and say present
  • Ensure that your professor has seen and heard you
  • You may turn camera and mic off
My phone doesn't have a front camera!
  • Please use a device with a camera. This is important to ensure votes are not misused.
  • Or if you can, ask someone to hold the phone and use the backcamera

Step 4

Wait till the appointed time for polling

I am boredddd!
  • If this were in real-life you'd be standing the entire time. üòë
  • This way you at least get to sit! üéâ

Step 5

Your professor will share the link to the Ballot Form

I did not get the link!
  • Ask your professor where they have shared the link

Step 6

Open the link to the Ballot from
For now, try this similarly set up form at forms.gle/s333jfaMsHcAAkS86

I need permission?
  • Check if you are logged in on your browser. Refer Step 1b
  • Used something other than Safari in Step 1b?
  • Copy and paste the link into your browser
It didn't load at all
  • Check your internet

Step 7

Vote for your preferred candidate and submit the form
Remember, no take-backs. You can submit only once

Step 8

Go back to the Meet
Open the chat
Send a message saying ‚ÄúYES‚Äù

I got disconnected You can:
  • Try joining again
  • Ask a friend to send a message with your name saying "YES"

Step 9

Leave the Meet

Step 10

Await the results

Live. Love. MCC! ‚ù§Ô∏è
